DOC.brief_summary: This study design develop test gender-specific , web-based drug abuse prevention program . Study participant adolescent girl age 13 14 year complete measure online . Randomly assign girl also interact online skills-based program subsequent annual booster session . The study 's primary hypothesis rate 30-day alcohol drug use low among girl assign receive intervention .
DOC.brief_title: A Web-Based Intervention Prevent Drug Abuse Among Adolescent Girls
DOC.criteria: resident USA speak English private computer Internet
